import React,{useState} from 'react' const Contact = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ name: "", email: "", message: "" }); let name, value; const getUserData = (event) => { name = event.target.name; value = event.target.value; setUser({...user,[name]:value}) } const postData = (e) => { e.prevent}; return (
contact form

) } export default Contact
